pages.title: New redstone
pages.text: New redstone items that you can add to your contraptions.
Gravisand falls like regular sand unless powered by redstone. Additonally, gravisand will propagate the signal to any adjacent gravisand block, causing them to float or fall also.
Redstone stand falls like sand and emits a signal like a Redstone Block.
When powered the randomizer will have a random chance of disrupting a redstone signal either to the left or right.

The inductors output value is the analog sum of all 3 input sides. It can also be locked by having a repeater or comparator pointing to it. While locked, it'll maintain the output value regardless of any changes.
The weather sensor outpus a redstone signal if it is raining or snowing.
The ender watcher outputs a redstone signal if the player is looking at it.
